vsParam:
Huh? Oh, it's you.
What's wrong? You came here for dinner?

No, we heard that the dragon is in Ateria.
Maybe we can find more information here...

Oh, that dragon.
We got nothing for now.

But all the monsters around it are scared away
and they're destroying everything. It's tricky! Haha!

What's so funny about that!?
Have you been sitting by?

No worries. I'm getting ready. We're not that
giant thing's match, so we can't confront it directly.
I see... In this way, it's more necessary to investigate it.

Investigate? I have no idea about your plan,
but I'm preparing to wipe out its den at one fling!

What!? Wai... Wait.
That's too risky!
You should be be more careful...

Yeah, we almost know nothing about it. So we can't get
fully prepared when we don't know its characteristics...

Wow, [px]!?
Which side are you on!?

I know you want to defeat it ASAP...
But I think we'd better get fully prepared before that.

Haha! This is not good.
You're all so timid.

Such being the case, just help me get prepared.
I'll show you how capable my people are!

Um... Um...
What... What do we do? [px]...
Um... Anyway, we need to get ready to defeat the dragon.
It doesn't hurt to conduct investigations for both of us.
Oh, you know that! Let's give that thing a good lesson!
No, please keep preparing for now...
Alright, please pack up some handy things, bombs or whatever!

Um... You just ignored what Sterk said!?
Forget it, we'd better get prepared, [px]...
